name: Jacob Saw That Leah Was Ugly

verses.esv: 11 And there appeared to him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.
verses.kjv: 11 And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.
verses.niv: 11 Then an angel of the Lord appeared to him, standing at the right side of the altar of incense.

verses.esv:
28   May God give you of the dew of heaven
    and of the fatness of the earth
    and plenty of grain and wine.
verses.kjv: 28 Therefore God give thee of the dew of heaven, and the fatness of the earth, and plenty of corn and wine:
verses.niv: 28 May God give you of heaven's dew and of earth's richness- an abundance of grain and new wine.

verses.esv: 30:1 When Rachel saw that she bore Jacob no children, she envied her sister. She said to Jacob, “Give me children, or I shall die!”
verses.kjv: 1 And when Rachel saw that she bare Jacob no children, Rachel envied her sister; and said unto Jacob, Give me children, or else I die.
verses.niv: 1 When Rachel saw that she was not bearing Jacob any children, she became jealous of her sister. So she said to Jacob, "Give me children, or I'll die!"
